alert.note: Alert for Malheur County; Oregon Lower Treasure Valley (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 17 at 1:56AM PST until January 17 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST /10 AM PST/ THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 2 inches. * WHERE...Portions of southwest and west central Idaho and southeast Oregon. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST /10 AM PST/ this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery roads and difficult driving conditions.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Malheur County; Oregon Lower Treasure Valley
